response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than $80. Considering its true worth and your interest, I propose a special offer of $95 for the product. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 95}
